scenario: In 2023, Heidi has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) (or contribution base) of $154,381.30. Heidi makes a charitable contribution of $69,928.39 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b), the deduction is limited to 50% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2023.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 50% of AGI ($77,190.65). Since the contribution ($69,928.39) is compared to the limit, the allowable deduction is $69,928.39.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
